Nashville-Davidson.Beacon Center of Tennessee: The Beacon Center of Tennessee, formerly the Tennessee Center for Policy Research (TCPR), is a non-profit free-market think tank based in Nashville, Tennessee. The organization's stated mission is to "empower Tennesseans to reclaim control of their lives, so that they can freely pursue their version of the American Dream." The Center's research areas include tax and economic policy, education policy, and healthcare policy. The organization is a member of the State Policy Network.
